title: U.N. Whistleblower: International Community Has Failed Darfur
teaser: The International Criminal Court (ICC) is scaling back its work in Darfur, Sudan â€” a conflict that the U.S. once labeled a genocide. The ICC prosecutor says she is shifting resources elsewhere and blamed deadlock on the UN Security Council.
